text: The Men's team pursuit competition at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 28 February and 1 March 2018.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The eight fastest teams advance to the first round.Qualifying results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" |- ! Cañellas Vicente García de Mateos Illart Zuazubiskar ||4:10.677||+14.963|| |} ===First round=== First round heats were held as follows: Heat 1: 6th v 7th fastest Heat 2: 5th v 8th fastest Heat 3: 2nd v 3rd fastest Heat 4: 1st v 4th fastest The winners of heats 3 and 4 proceeded to the gold medal race. The remaining six teams were ranked on time, from which the top two proceeded to the bronze medal race.First round results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- ! Rank !! Heat !! Nation !! Time !!
